actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to prevent the Secretary of Agriculture from requiring deductions from the proceeds of milk marketed commercially by producers in deficit milk production areas designated as disaster areas because of drought.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from requiring milk producer assessments from drought-affected areas designated as disaster areas under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to prevent the Secretary of Agriculture from requiring deductions from the proceeds of milk marketed commercially by producers in deficit milk production areas designated as disaster areas because of drought.
